original_text: Instead, when someone asks you to a meal, you should do this. Go and sit in the least important place. Then the man that asked you to the meal will see you there. And he may say to you, “My friend, move up here to a better place.” Everyone who is there at the meal will see this. So they will know that you are an important person.
korean_text: 청함을 받았을 때에 차라리 가서 끝자리에 앉으라 그러면 너를 청한 자가 와서 너더러 벗이여 올라 앉으라 하리니 그 때에야 함께 앉은 모든 사람 앞에서 영광이 있으리라

sentences.original_text: Instead, when someone asks you to a meal
sentences.korean_translation: 대신 누군가가 당신을 식사에 초대했을 때

sentences.original_text: Go and sit in the least important place
Then the man that asked you to the meal will see you there
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신을 식사에 초대한 사람이 그곳에서 당신을 볼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: And he may say to you
"My friend, move up here to a better place."
Everyone who is there at the meal will see this
sentences.korean_translation: 식사에 있는 모든 사람이 이것을 볼 것입니다

sentences.original_text: So they will know that you are an important person
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 당신이 중요한 사람이라는 것을 알게 될 것입니다
